message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,000.  I believe it's a great deal for both of us, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to offer $16,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my initial asking price. I'm willing to come down to $16,500. Let's find a solution that works for both of us.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $16,000 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
